title: LF people who just wanna HAVE FUN playing the game :)
body:
Hey Everyone,

I'm just a run of the mill league player who is looking to have a group of people who just play together in norms (or ranked 5's if we have enough people or even want to) and just actually HAVE FUN playing the game and not really care about winning/losing or sucking/going well.

I've been playing this game for like 3 years now or something and I really just want to be able to play with some people and just have a laugh and enjoy myself. If anyone thinks this sounds like a cool casual thing they might like then just add me/let me know :)

Cheers :)

replies.body: hi im keen I main jg
hey, awesome! :) just be sure to be open to playing a mix of roles and champs :)
gbg727 add me up (y) u will love it

id be glad to play with ya even make ranked team
IGN Fire Flareon
Role Support
sweet! it's all relaxed and we'll probs swap roles around a bit but yeah good to have people with different mains :)

I'm keen, have been playing normals since the beta! :P  
Feel free to add. :-)

> [{quoted}](name=Fruitlewp,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=wLhflAAw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-20T12:58:09.508+0000)
>
> I'm keen, have been playing normals since the beta! :P  
> Feel free to add. :-)

Me too! Add me as well if you like.

When you're as bad as me, going good or winning is the least of your worries. xD

I play for fun and nothing but
haha that's the spirit! you wanna join?
I'm actually at school now. But I'll add you when I get home :)

im a casual player

i will be on usually on weekends, if you catch me on, send and invite and ill remember xd
awesome! i'll add you after i finish the game i'm in :)
